topic.title: Main Talk Screen
topic.shortdesc: The main screen of the application, allow the user interaction.

body.p: Once you entered one of the talks, you will see the users that participate. Each of them is represented by a small circle, arranged around a discussion table.
The messages are colored in the color assigned to each of the user, and arranged in callouts. For instance the messages from JD appear like this:

To enter a message:
Click into the text field from the bottom of the dialog
Press the Send button.
To terminate a discussion, press the Leave button. The remaining users will be notified of you leaving the discussion.
